Speaker: RD
Sentence: Èna plen de piti ki jamen ... kòman t <VERB>apèl</VERB> sa, GROW UP, o ... se de piti toujou ... se de zanfan. ...

Speaker: RD
Sentence: Wè, ti-boug-la, li deside i se kouri, sa-fe li, li ale o bal, li di, 'Jeu <VERB>veu</VERB> war sa.'

Speaker: RD
Sentence: I di, 'Se la bonn muzik,' i di, 'mo <VERB>tann</VERB> zafè-sa-l,' i di, 'mo pa kònè sa-ki e fe li,' to kònen.

Speaker: RD
Sentence: Men li di, 'Mo <VERB>veu</VERB> wa,' i te kiriyeu.

Speaker: RD
Sentence: Sa-fe ti-boug-leu kouri kote la mezon lan, e li monte ann la garli, e li garde par la fnet, dan la gran chanm deuvan, to konnen, ye te ote tou le, ye <VERB>ote</VERB> tou le li l anndan e ye se mè sa daeryè la.

Speaker: RD
Sentence: 'Mè,' i di, '<DET>mo garson</DET>,' i di, 'sa to wa, sa to wa kòm sa? (Poukè) to <VERB>farouch</VERB> kom sa?'
